answers.answer: I recommend immediate veterinary evaluation; vomiting and not eating in an older dog can indicate severe disease such as kidney failure, pancreatitis or diabetes among others, and exam, bloodwork +/- xrays of her abdomen are needed.Kimberly Coyner, DVM DACVD

question: I was recently given a nine year old dog, which was seperated from two other dogs, and a loving family. she has not ate since friday and yesterday shes  started to vomit up water we"ve only been in the yard and shes up to date on all of her shots. Is it possible that she is depressed or should I take her in to see the vet.
title: seperated from brother not eating and has started vomiting
